name: Krazy Karts
description:
A simple retro-style racing game - enjoy!

Controls:
    
Menu Controls              W A S D
Select Menu            Space

Movement (Player 1)          W A S D
Movement (Player 2)          Arrow Keys

Use Powerup (Player 1)        Space
Use Powerup (Player 2)        Enter

Exit Game (at any time)        Esc

This game has only been tested on Windows 10 and is assumed to only work on that platform. Please let me know if it doesn't work for you if you are using that platform. Note: this game only runs in 1920 x 1080 full screen.

Acknowledgements:

This was made using the s0lly Game Engine

Music by Eric Skiff, song "All of Us" for the intro scene and the following tunes for in game music:
"All of Us"
"A Night of Dizzy Spells"
"Arpanauts"
"Chibi Ninja"
"HHavok Main"
"We're All Under the Stars"
(All available at http://EricSkiff.com/music - the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 (CC-BY) license can be found here: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
